message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is valued at $150. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $140. This is a special offer tailored to appreciate your interest and ensure you receive the best value. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.
